name: Australian Mobile Phone Number
description: Will match all valid Australian mobile numbers with optional leading Australian area code including optional spaces and hyphens.Examples:04001234560400 123 4560400 1234560400 12 34 560400-123-456+61400123456+61 400 123 456+61-400-123-456+61 400123456+61400 123456
author: Lee McNamara
